record.title: ORDER FOR RECORD TO REMAIN OPEN
record.narrative:
ORDER FOR RECORD TO REMAIN OPEN -- (Senate - July 13, 2007)

[Page: S9226]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Record remain open today until 1 p.m. for the introduction of legislation, submission of statements, and cosponsorships.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
